Package eu.sydisnet.blog.samples.deltaspike.cdi12.boundary

Package where resides coarse-grained services artifacts.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DependentHelloService
    Component whose responsibility is to send to the client a welcome message.
    SingletonHelloService Deprecated
    This component is never loaded from CDI 1.2 if bean-discovery-mode="annotated" in META-INF/beans.xml
    SingletonHelloServiceV2
    Component whose responsibility is to send to the client a welcome message.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Unique
    Dans CDI 1.2, il y a eu certaines clarifications concernant les scopes.
